Headline: #29 State & #65 Grand Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Illinois/St. Clair
ShortDescription: Eastbound 29 State & 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois: due to, street blockage near Illinois/St. Clair.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #29 State and #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois: due to, street blockage near Illinois/St. Clair.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Bloomingdale
ShortDescription: #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, North, Central, Grand and Austin: due to, signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, North, Central, Grand and Austin: due to, signal problems.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Limited Service
ShortDescription: Green Line service limited service via shuttle buses available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems. We are working to run as much service as frequently and as evenly as possible.

Currently, trains are operating in one section:

  • between Harlem and Ashland/63rd

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service to Cottage Grove.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Pink Line has been temporarily suspended due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Pink Line has been temporarily suspended due to signal problems.

Shuttle buses are available between 54th/Cermak and Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
